title: Rotten to the Core
description: Foe. Friend. Liar. Lover. Murderer. What are you?Everything.The eternal realm of Light has long been at peace under the rule of the Kind King, and Rhea’s hopelessly bored of it. She dreams of escaping the fate her parents want for her right in the little village where she was born, alongside the mayor’s son.Then everyone she’s ever known dies when the Shade’s army marches on their land.To avenge her family, she forges herself into a lethal weapon, ready to cut down the invaders.At the heart of the Shade’s court, killing the king of darkness isn’t as simple as Rhea had hoped.Especially given the fact that he might not be her true enemy.Rotten to the Core is a fantasy enemy to lover romance set in the Seven Kingdoms universe.
author: Alexi Blake
